DOC.brief_summary: This randomised, split-mouth clinical study evaluated the marginal quality of direct Class I and Class II restorations made of microhybrid composite and applied using two polymerisation protocols,
DOC.criteria: subjects at least 18 years old, require restorations due to primary caries in contralateral quadrants with opposing and adjacent tooth contact, having no restoration in the antagonist, Exclusion Criteria allergic to resinbased materials, pregnant or nursing, periodontal disease
